getAssetType(address).details: Returns the asset type associated with a given token.

params._token: The address of the token whose asset type is being queried.

returns._0: The asset type of the token (e.g., 1 for Fund, 2 for Equity).

getDividendFee(address).details: Returns the dividend fee for the given token.

getEscrowFee(address).details: Returns the escrow fee for the given token.

getFund(address).details: Returns the address of the fund linked to the given token.

getMasterFactory().details: Returns the address of the master factory contract.

getRedemptionFee(address).details: Returns the redemption fee for the given token.

getTokenTotalSupply(address).details: Returns the total token supply for a given token.

params._token: The address of the token whose total supply is being queried.

returns._0: The total supply of the specified token.

getWrapFee(address).details: Returns the wrap fee for the given token.
